name: Zowta Ltd
tag_list: magento, shipping, extensions, consultancy, custom, solutions
overview:
Zowta Ltd is a software consultancy which trades under the name WebShopApps.com and Auctionmaid brands. They provide an extensive set of software solutions for the Magento e-commerce market. They have built a reputation on the Magento e-commerce platform for providing shipping based solutions, making them the market leader in this space.

They have a selection of over 40 shipping extensions available via their website and they also create custom built Magento shipping extensions based on complex customer requirements. They work in close harmony with various web design agencies to create custom Magento solutions for clients.

WebShopApps is led by Director & Technical Lead Karen Baker, whose experience has been in programming and designing at the highest level for the financial markets in London for 15 years.
